account.settings.message.duplicate.tpa.p: Akaunti ya {provider} uliyochagua tayari imeunganishwa kwenye akaunti nyingine ya {siteName} .
account.settings.message.managed.setting: Mipangilio ya wasifu wako inadhibitiwa na {managerTitle} . Wasiliana na msimamizi wako au {support} kwa usaidizi.
account.settings.page.heading: Mipangilio ya Akaunti
account.settings.banner.beta.language: Umeweka lugha yako kuwa {beta_language} , ambayo haijatafsiriwa kikamilifu kwa sasa. Unaweza kutusaidia kutafsiri lugha hii kikamilifu kwa kujiunga na jumuiya ya Transifex na kuongeza tafsiri kutoka kwa Kiingereza kwa wanafunzi wanaozungumza {beta_language} .
account.settings.section.account.informa: Mipangilio hii inajumuisha maelezo ya msingi kuhusu akaunti yako.
account.settings.section.linked.accounts: Unaweza kuunganisha akaunti zako za utambulisho ili kurahisisha kuingia kwa {siteName} .
account.settings.field.username.help.tex: Jina linalokutambulisha kwenye {siteName} . Huwezi kubadilisha jina lako la mtumiaji.
account.settings.field.full.name: Jina kamili
account.settings.field.full.name.help.te: Jina linalotumika kwa uthibitishaji wa kitambulisho na linaloonekana kwenye vyeti vyako.
Jina linaloonekana kwenye wasifu wako wa umma.
Jina hili limechaguliwa ili kuonekana kwenye vyeti vyako na rekodi zinazoonekana kwa umma.
account.settings.field.name.verified.hel: Jina hili limethibitishwa na kitambulisho cha picha.
Jina hili limethibitishwa na kitambulisho cha picha, na limechaguliwa kuonekana kwenye vyeti vyako na rekodi zinazoonekana kwa umma.
Jina hili limethibitishwa na proctoring, na limechaguliwa kuonekana kwenye vyeti vyako na rekodi zinazoonekana kwa umma.
Uthibitishaji umewasilishwa. Hii kwa kawaida huchukua saa 48 au chini ya hapo. Jina lililothibitishwa haliwezi kubadilishwa kwa wakati huu.
Mtihani wako uliotayarishwa umewasilishwa. Jina lililothibitishwa haliwezi kubadilishwa kwa wakati huu. Tafadhali angalia tena baada ya siku 2-5.
Uthibitishaji wa utambulisho unapofaulu, jina hili litaonekana kwenye vyeti vyako na rekodi zinazoonekana kwa umma. Jina lililothibitishwa haliwezi kubadilishwa kwa wakati huu.
Pindi tu mtihani wako uliotayarishwa utakapopitisha ukaguzi, jina hili litaonekana kwenye cheti chako na rekodi zinazoonekana hadharani. Jina Lililothibitishwa haliwezi kubadilishwa kwa wakati huu.
account.settings.field.name.verified.ver: Andika jina lako jinsi linavyoonekana kwenye mwanafunzi, kazini au kadi yako ya kitambulisho iliyotolewa na serikali ambayo muda wake haujaisha.
account.settings.field.full.name.help.te: Uthibitishaji umewasilishwa. Hii kwa kawaida huchukua saa 48 au chini ya hapo. Jina kamili haliwezi kubadilishwa kwa wakati huu.
Mtihani wako uliotayarishwa umewasilishwa. Jina kamili haliwezi kubadilishwa kwa wakati huu. Tafadhali angalia tena baada ya siku 2-5.
Uthibitishaji wa utambulisho unapofaulu, jina hili litaonekana kwenye vyeti vyako na rekodi zinazoonekana kwa umma. Jina kamili haliwezi kubadilishwa kwa wakati huu.
Pindi tu mtihani wako uliotayarishwa utakapopitisha ukaguzi, jina hili litaonekana kwenye vyeti vyako na rekodi zinazoonekana hadharani. Jina kamili haliwezi kubadilishwa kwa wakati huu.
account.settings.field.name.verified.suc: Ombi lako la uthibitishaji wa kitambulisho limekamilika. Sasa una chaguo la kuchagua ni jina gani unapendelea lionekane kwenye vyeti na rekodi zako za umma.
Ombi lako la kubadilisha jina limekamilika!
account.settings.field.name.verified.fai: Jaribio lako la hivi majuzi la uthibitishaji wa utambulisho halikufaulu. Mipangilio ya akaunti inayohusiana imerejeshwa.
Pata maelezo zaidi kuhusu uthibitishaji wa kitambulisho
account.settings.field.name.verified.sub: Ombi lako la uthibitishaji wa kitambulisho limewasilishwa na kwa kawaida huchukua kati ya saa 24 na 48 kukamilika.
Ombi lako likiidhinishwa, jina lako lililosasishwa litaonekana kwenye vyeti vyote vinavyohusika na rekodi zinazoonekana kwa umma.
Ombi lako la kubadilisha jina linakaribia kukamilika!
account.settings.field.email.confirmatio: Tumetuma ujumbe wa uthibitisho kwa {value} . Bofya kiungo katika ujumbe ili kusasisha anwani yako ya barua pepe.
account.settings.field.email.help.text: Unapokea ujumbe kutoka kwa {siteName} na timu za kozi kwenye anwani hii.
account.settings.field.secondary.email: Anwani ya barua pepe ya kurejesha akaunti
account.settings.field.secondary.email.e: Ongeza anwani ya barua pepe ya kurejesha akaunti
account.settings.field.secondary.email.c: Tumetuma ujumbe wa uthibitisho kwa {value} . Bofya kiungo katika ujumbe ili kusasisha anwani yako ya barua pepe ya urejeshi.
account.settings.field.dob.form.button: Tafadhali thibitisha tarehe yako ya kuzaliwa
account.settings.field.dob.form.title: Ingiza mwezi na mwaka wako wa kuzaliwa
account.settings.field.dob.form.help.tex: Tunaomba maelezo ya mwezi na mwaka wa kuzaliwa ili kutusaidia kutii majukumu yetu ya kisheria.
account.settingsfield.dob.error.general: Hitilafu ya kiufundi imetokea. Tafadhali jaribu tena.
account.settings.field.site.language.hel: Lugha inayotumika katika tovuti hii yote. Tovuti hii kwa sasa inapatikana katika idadi ndogo ya lugha.
account.settings.field.time.zone.descrip: Chagua saa za eneo za kuonyesha tarehe za kozi. Ikiwa hutabainisha saa za eneo, tarehe za kozi, ikiwa ni pamoja na tarehe za mwisho za kazi, zitaonyeshwa katika saa za eneo la kivinjari chako.
account.settings.section.social.media.de: Kwa hiari, unganisha akaunti zako za kibinafsi na aikoni za mitandao ya kijamii kwenye wasifu wako wa {siteName} .
account.settings.static.field.empty: Hakuna thamani iliyowekwa. Wasiliana na msimamizi wako wa {enterprise} ili kufanya mabadiliko.
error.notfound.message: Ukurasa unaotafuta haupatikani au kuna hitilafu katika URL. Tafadhali angalia URL na ujaribu tena.
account.page.title: Akaunti | {siteName}
id.verification.access.blocked.denied: Hatuwezi kuthibitisha utambulisho wako kwa wakati huu. Ikiwa bado hujawezesha akaunti yako, tafadhali angalia folda yako ya barua taka kwa barua pepe ya kuwezesha kutoka {email} .
id.verification.example.card.alt: Mfano wa kitambulisho halali kilicho na jina kamili na picha.
id.verification.requirements.title: Mahitaji ya Uthibitishaji wa Picha
id.verification.requirements.description: Ili kukamilisha Uthibitishaji wa Picha, utahitaji zifuatazo:
id.verification.requirements.card.id.tex: Unahitaji kitambulisho halali ambacho kina jina lako kamili na picha, kama vile leseni ya udereva au pasipoti.
id.verification.privacy.title: Taarifa za Faragha
id.verification.privacy.need.photo.answe: Tunatumia picha zako za uthibitishaji ili kuthibitisha utambulisho wako na kuhakikisha uhalali wa cheti chako.
id.verification.privacy.do.with.photo.qu: Je {siteName} inafanya nini na picha hii?
id.verification.privacy.do.with.photo.an: Tunasimba picha yako kwa njia fiche na kuituma kwa huduma yetu ya uidhinishaji ili ikaguliwe. Picha na maelezo yako hayajahifadhiwa au kuonekana popote kwenye {siteName} baada ya mchakato wa uthibitishaji kukamilika.
id.verification.access.blocked.title: Uthibitishaji wa Utambulisho
id.verification.access.blocked.enrollmen: Kwa sasa hujajiandikisha katika kozi inayohitaji uthibitishaji wa utambulisho.
id.verification.access.blocked.pending: Tayari umewasilisha maelezo yako ya uthibitishaji. Utaona ujumbe kwenye dashibodi yako mchakato wa uthibitishaji utakapokamilika (kwa kawaida ndani ya siku 5).
id.verification.photo.enable.detection.p: Ikiwa imechaguliwa, kisanduku kitatokea karibu na uso wako. Uso wako unaweza kuonekana wazi ikiwa sanduku karibu nayo ni bluu. Ikiwa uso wako hauko katika nafasi nzuri au hauonekani, sanduku litakuwa nyekundu.
id.verification.photo.enable.detection.i: Ikiwekwa alama, kisanduku kitaonekana kuzunguka uso kwenye kadi yako ya kitambulisho. Uso unaweza kuonekana wazi ikiwa sanduku karibu nayo ni bluu. Ikiwa uso hauko katika nafasi nzuri au hauonekani, sanduku litakuwa nyekundu.
id.verification.photo.feedback.top.cente: Msimamo usio sahihi. Kituo cha juu.
id.verification.photo.feedback.center.ce: Msimamo usio sahihi. Karibu sana na kamera.
id.verification.photo.feedback.bottom.ce: Msimamo usio sahihi. Kituo cha chini.
id.verification.camera.access.title: Ruhusa za Kamera
id.verification.camera.access.skip: Ruka na upakie faili za picha badala yake
id.verification.camera.access.success: Inaonekana kamera yako inafanya kazi na iko tayari.
id.verification.camera.access.failure: Inaonekana hatuwezi kufikia kamera yako. Utahitaji kupakia faili za picha zako na kitambulisho chako cha picha.
id.verification.camera.access.failure.te: Inaonekana hatuwezi kufikia kamera yako. Tafadhali thibitisha kuwa kamera yako ya wavuti imeunganishwa na kwamba umeruhusu kivinjari chako kuifikia.
Ili kuwezesha ufikiaji wa kamera katika Chrome:
Fungua Chrome.
Nenda kwenye Zaidi > Mipangilio.
Kwa Windows: Alt+F, Alt+E, au F10 ikifuatiwa na upau wa nafasi
Kwa Mac: Amri+,
Chini ya kichupo cha "Faragha na usalama", chagua "Mipangilio ya Tovuti" kisha "Kamera."
Chini ya "Imezuiwa," pata "edx.org" na uchague.
Katika sehemu ya "Ruhusa", sasisha ruhusa za kamera ziwe "Ruhusu."
Ili kuwezesha ufikiaji wa kamera katika Internet Explorer:
Fungua Kidhibiti cha Mipangilio cha Flash Player kwa kwenda kwenye Mipangilio ya Windows > Paneli Dhibiti > Flash Player.
Chagua kichupo cha "Kamera na Maikrofoni", kisha uchague kitufe cha "Mipangilio ya Kamera na Maikrofoni kulingana na Tovuti".
Chagua "edx.org" kutoka kwenye orodha ya tovuti na ubadilishe ruhusa kwa kuchagua "Ruhusu" kwenye menyu kunjuzi.
Ili kuwezesha ufikiaji wa kamera katika Firefox:
Fungua Firefox.
Ingiza "kuhusu:mapendeleo" kwenye upau wa URL.
Chagua kichupo cha "Faragha na Usalama", na uende kwenye sehemu ya "Ruhusa".
Karibu na "Kamera," chagua kitufe cha "Mipangilio...".
Katika upau wa utafutaji, ingiza "edx.org."
Katika safu wima ya hali ya "edx.org," chagua "Ruhusu" kutoka kwenye menyu kunjuzi.
Chagua "Hifadhi Mabadiliko."
Ili kuwezesha ufikiaji wa kamera katika Safari:
Fungua Safari.
Bofya kwenye menyu ya programu ya Safari, kisha uchague "Mapendeleo." Unaweza pia kutumia Command+, kama njia ya mkato ya kibodi.
Chagua kichupo cha "Tovuti" na kisha uchague "Kamera."
Chagua "edx.org" na ubadilishe ruhusa za kamera kuwa "Ruhusu."
id.verification.camera.access.failure.un: Inaonekana kivinjari chako hakitumii ufikiaji wa kamera.
Kivinjari cha Chrome kwa sasa hakitumii ufikiaji wa kamera kwenye vifaa vya iOS, kama vile iPhone na iPad.
Tafadhali tumia kivinjari kingine ili kukamilisha Uthibitishaji wa Utambulisho.
id.verification.photo.tips.title: Vidokezo Muhimu vya Picha
id.verification.photo.tips.description: Kisha, tutahitaji upige picha ya uso wako. Tafadhali kagua vidokezo muhimu hapa chini.
id.verification.photo.tips.list.title: Vidokezo vya Picha
id.verification.photo.tips.list.descript: Ili kupiga picha iliyofanikiwa, hakikisha kwamba:
id.verification.photo.tips.list.inside.f: Uso wako wote unafaa ndani ya fremu.
id.verification.portrait.photo.instructi: When your face is in position, use the Take Photo button below to take your photo.
id.verification.camera.help.sight.questi: What if I can't see the camera image or if I can't see my photo to determine which side is visible?
id.verification.camera.help.sight.answer: You may be able to complete the image capture procedure without assistance, but it may take a couple of submission attempts to get the camera positioning right. Optimal camera positioning varies with each computer, but generally the best position for a headshot is approximately 12-18 inches (30-45 centimeters) from the camera, with your head centered relative to the computer screen. If the photos you submit are rejected, try moving the computer or camera orientation to change the lighting angle.

You may be able to complete the image capture procedure without assistance, but it may take a couple of submission attempts to get the camera positioning right. Optimal camera positioning varies with each computer, but generally, the best position for a photo of an ID card is 8-12 inches (20-30 centimeters) from the camera, with the ID card centered relative to the camera. If the photos you submit are rejected, try moving the computer or camera orientation to change the lighting angle. The most common reason for rejection is inability to read the text on the ID card.
id.verification.camera.help.difficulty.q: What if I have difficulty holding my head in position relative to the camera?
What if I have difficulty holding my ID in position relative to the camera?
id.verification.camera.help.difficulty.a: If you require assistance with taking a photo for submission, contact {siteName} support for additional suggestions.
id.verification.id.photo.unclear.questio: Is your ID card image not clear or too blurry?
id.verification.id.tips.title: Helpful Identification Card Tips
id.verification.id.tips.description: Next, we'll need you to take a photo of a valid identification card that includes your full name and photo, such as a driver’s license or passport. Please have your ID ready.
id.verification.id.tips.list.clear: Ensure that you can see your photo and clearly read your name.
id.verification.id.photo.title.camera: Take a Photo of Your Identification Card
id.verification.id.photo.title.upload: Upload a Photo of Your Identification Card
id.verification.id.photo.instructions.ca: When your ID is in position, use the Take Photo button below to take your photo. Please use a passport, driver’s license, or another identification card that includes your full name and a picture of your face.
id.verification.id.photo.instructions.up: Please upload a photo of your identification card. Ensure the entire ID fits inside the frame and is well-lit. The file size must be under 10 MB. Supported formats:
The file you have selected is not a supported image type. Please choose from the following formats:
The file you have selected is too large. Please try again with a file less than 10MB.
id.verification.name.check.title: Double-Check Your Name
id.verification.name.check.instructions: Does the name below match the name on your photo ID? If not, update the name below to match your photo ID.
id.verification.name.check.mismatch.info: If the name below does not match your photo ID, your identity verification will be denied.
id.verification.name.error: Please enter your name as it appears on your photo ID.
id.verification.name.label: Name
id.verification.account.name.photo.alt: Photo of your ID to be submitted.
id.verification.review.title: Review Your Photos
id.verification.review.description: Make sure we can verify your identity with the photos and information you have provided.
id.verification.review.portrait.label: Your Portrait
id.verification.review.portrait.alt: Photo of your face to be submitted.
id.verification.review.id.label: Your Identification Card
id.verification.review.id.alt: Photo of your identification card to be submitted.
id.verification.submission.alert.error.f: A photo of your face is required. Please retake your portrait photo.
id.verification.submission.alert.error.i: A photo of your ID card is required. Please retake your ID photo.
id.verification.submission.alert.error.n: A valid account name is required. Please update your account name to match the name on your ID.
id.verification.submission.alert.error.u: One or more of the files you have uploaded is in an unsupported format. Please choose from the following:
id.verification.submitted.title: Identity Verification in Progress
id.verification.submitted.text: We have received your information and are verifying your identity. You will be notified when the verification process is complete (usually within 5 days). In the meantime, you can still access all available course content.
id.verification.photo.upload.help.title: Upload a Photo Instead
id.verification.photo.camera.help.title: Use Your Camera Instead
id.verification.photo.upload.help.text: If you are having trouble using the photo capture above, you may want to upload a photo instead. To upload a photo, click the button below.
id.verification.photo.camera.help.text: If you are having trouble uploading a photo above, you may want to use your camera instead. To use your camera, click the button below.

notification.preference.guide.body: Notifications for certain activities are enabled by default,
If checked, this name will appear on your certificates and public-facing records.
account.settings.field.name.modal.certif: Choose a preferred name for certificates and public-facing records
account.settings.delete.account.text.3.e: You may also lose access to verified certificates and other program credentials like MicroMasters certificates. You can make a copy of these for your records before proceeding with deletion. {actionLink}.
account.settings.delete.account.text.3: You may also lose access to verified certificates and other program credentials. You can make a copy of these for your records before proceeding with deletion.
account.settings.delete.account.subheade: We're sorry to see you go!
account.settings.delete.account.text.1: Please note: Deletion of your account and personal data is permanent and cannot be undone. {siteName} will not be able to recover your account or the data that is deleted.
account.settings.delete.account.text.2: Once your account is deleted, you cannot use it to take courses on {siteName}.
account.settings.delete.account.text.2.e: Once your account is deleted, you cannot use it to take courses on the edX app, edx.org, or any other site hosted by edX. This includes access to edx.org from your employer’s or university’s system and access to private sites offered by MIT Open Learning, Wharton Executive Education, and Harvard Medical School.
account.settings.delete.account.text.3.l: Follow these instructions for printing or downloading a certificate
account.settings.delete.account.text.war: Warning: Account deletion is permanent. Please read the above carefully before proceeding. This is an irreversible action, and you will no longer be able to use the same email on {siteName}.
account.settings.delete.account.text.cha: Want to change your email, name, or password instead?
account.settings.delete.account.modal.te: You have selected "Delete My Account". Deletion of your account and personal data is permanent and cannot be undone. {siteName} will not be able to recover your account or the data that is deleted.
If you proceed, you will be unable to use this account to take courses on {siteName}.

If you proceed, you will be unable to use this account to take courses on the edX app, edx.org, or any other site hosted by edX. This includes access to edx.org from your employer's or university's system and access to private sites offered by MIT Open Learning, Wharton Executive Education, and Harvard Medical School.
account.settings.delete.account.modal.en: If you still wish to continue and delete your account, please enter your account password:
account.settings.delete.account.error.un: Sorry, there was an error trying to process your request. Please try again later.
account.settings.delete.account.modal.af: We're sorry to see you go! Your account will be deleted shortly.

Account deletion, including removal from email lists, may take a few weeks to fully process through our system. If you want to opt-out of emails before then, please unsubscribe from the footer of any email.
account.settings.message.demographics.se: An error occurred attempting to retrieve or save your account information. Please try again later.
account.settings.name.change.title.id: This name change requires identity verification
account.settings.name.change.warning.one: Warning: This action updates the name that appears on all certificates that have been earned on this account in the past and any certificates you are currently earning or will earn in the future.
account.settings.name.change.warning.two: This action cannot be undone without verifying your identity.
account.settings.name.change.id.name.lab: Enter your name as it appears on your unexpired student, work, or government-issued identification card.
account.settings.name.change.id.name.pla: Enter the name on your photo ID
account.settings.name.change.error.gener: A technical error occurred. Please try again.
account.settings.editable.field.password: We've sent a message to {email}. Click the link in the message to reset your password. Didn't receive the message? Contact {technicalSupportLink}.
Your previous request is in progress, please try again in few moments.
There was a problem disconnecting this account. Contact support if the problem persists.
account.settings.sso.no.providers: No accounts can be linked at this time.
id.verification.request.camera.access.in: In order to take a photo using your webcam, you may receive a browser prompt for access to your camera. {clickAllow}
id.verification.requirements.account.man: Your account settings are managed by {managerTitle}. If the name on your photo ID does not match the name on your account, please contact your {profileDataManager} administrator or {support} for help before completing the Photo Verification process.
id.verification.requirements.card.device: You need a device that has a camera. If you receive a browser prompt for access to your camera, please make sure to click {allow}.
id.verification.account.name.summary.ale: Your account settings are managed by {managerTitle}. If the name on your photo ID does not match the name on your account, please contact your {profileDataManager} administrator or {support} for help.
idv.submission.alert.error: We encountered a technical error while trying to submit ID verification. This might be a temporary issue, so please try again in a few minutes. If the problem persists, please go to {support_link} for help.
